description:
Shiko Academy student Tachibana Ritsuka is summoned by the mysterious and handsome boys of the Student Council and accused of violating school rules. On top of which, a horrible incident happens at home. Who can she turn to, and why is she being targeted?
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Le Quadrille du tabou et de la dépravation
倒錯と禁断のカドリール
